usageInformation.usage: Application: rinse once daily rinse 10 ml (=1 filled Meridol bottle cap) for 30 seconds, produces the desired effect. In exceptional cases, increased use may be indicated on the recommendation of a specialist. The additional use of Meridol toothpaste supports the regenerating effect on the gums. Protect from light and heat. For questions: 061.725.45.45.
usageInformation.additionalInformation: No alcohol. Meridol contains a unique, worldwide patented combination of active ingredients with long-lasting effect. It inactivates the plaque in places that are difficult to reach with a toothbrush and thus prevents its negative effect on the gums. Through their negative effect on the gums. Due to the special adhesive power of the combination of active ingredients and the resulting depot effect, the formation of new plaque is also inhibited in the long term. In addition, the stannous fluoride component has a beneficial effect on the gums and, thanks to the fluoride combination, also protects against cavities. Successfully clinically tested. Suitable for people aged 6 years and older, especially for wearers of bridges, partial dentures and orthodontic devices.
